page.title: 03COMMUNITY INVOLVEMENT
page.content: The Village Hall provides a large hall, committee room, kitchen and toilets for the use of its patrons. It was, and still is, run by a management committee drawn from different walks of life in the village and today includes a farmer's wife, the post mistress and the school master, to mention just a few. There are other meeting places in the village such as two shops, a pub and a working man's club but the village hall is the only place that can be hired for private use and the only place big enough to hold dances and the like.
